name: Proposed_Resolution_20-101.pdf
text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-101 (Deemed Approved April 29, 2013)

20 DCSTAT 1701

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Referred
March 5, 2013

To confirm the reappointment of Daphne Bernard to the Board of Pharmacy for the District of Columbia.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Board of Pharmacy Daphne Bernard Confirmation Resolution of
2013".

Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the reappointment of:

Daphne Bernard
6614 13th Place, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20012
(Ward 4)

as pharmacist member of the Board of Pharmacy for the District of Columbia, established by
section 208 of the District of Columbia Health Occupations Revision Act of 1985, effective
March 25, 1986, (D.C. Law 6-99; D.C. Official Code § 3-1202.08), and pursuant to section 2 of
the Confirmation Act of 1978, effective March 3, 1979, (D.C. Law 2-142; D. C. Official Code §
1-523.01), for a term to end March 12, 2016.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Board of
Pharmacy
Daphne
Bernard
Confirmation
Resolution of
2013
title: Board of Pharmacy Daphne Bernard Confirmation Resolution of 2013
